vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἀμᾰράντινος, η, ον,
of amaranth, i. e. unfading, στέφανος[Refs 2nd c.AD+]
__2 unfading, imperishable, στέφανος[NT]
vocabInfos.shortDef: unfading, without loss of pristine character
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
unfading, without loss of pristine character
unfading; without loss of pristine character, hence, enduring, 1Pet. 5:4*
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: chẳng hề tàn héo ; không thể mục nát
